name: Kris Roots
description:
A boy named Kris working as Farmer, discovers his true purpose in his life. Go on an adventure, travel back to time to save your roots!

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2023, held in Chennai in which the game secured first price in two categories...Gameplay and Art Style.

Theme: Roots

Controls: 

WASD: Movement, 

Mouse: Aim 

F: Time travel 

E: Next dialogue

Enter: Skip dialouge
